Test Name: Whole Genome Sequencing for Hereditary Disorders
Purpose: To detect genetic variants associated with hereditary disorders by sequencing the entire genome.
Container: EDTA tube for blood; FDA-cleared saliva collection kit (alternative)
Equipment: DNA extraction kit (e.g., Qiagen DNA Blood Mini Kit), Qubit fluorometer, Illumina DNA Prep library preparation kit, Illumina NextSeq/NovaSeq sequencer
